briefTitle: RCT to Examine the Effects of Scanning
officialTitle: An RCT to Examine the Effects of Scanning; a Major Step on the Path Towards Population Intervention
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* US adults, male or female, between 50 and 70 years of age.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Potential subjects will be excluded if they are not between the ages of 50 and 70
